statements: SELECT * FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 123;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, session_date FROM music_therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, therapy_type FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE patient_id = 456 AND therapy_type = 'Relaxation';
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, session_date, session_time FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE session_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY session_date, session_time;
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_id, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM music_therapy_sessions GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING num_patients > 2;
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE therapy_type = 'Relaxation' ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, patient_id, session_time FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE therapist_id = 101 AND patient_id = 201 ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM music_therapy_sessions GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING session_count > 2 ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), session_date)) AS avg_days_since_last_session FROM music_therapy_sessions GROUP BY therapist_id ORDER BY avg_days_since_last_session ASC;
SELECT therapist_id, patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM music_therapy_sessions GROUP BY therapist_id, patient_id HAVING total_sessions >= 3 ORDER BY therapist_id ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Counseling';
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT therapist_name, availability FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Psychiatry';
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Psychology';
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE availability = 1 ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT therapist_name FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT therapist_id, specialty FROM therapists WHERE availability = 0 AND therapist_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_id FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Counseling' ORDER BY therapist_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM therapists;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE availability > 0;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, date, time FROM appointments WHERE date = '2022-09-15';

SELECT therapist_name, patient_name, date, time FROM therapists INNER JOIN appointments ON therapists.therapist_id = appointments.therapist_id INNER JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY therapist_name, date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM therapists WHERE availability > 0
SELECT appointment_id, date, time FROM appointments WHERE date >= '2023-01-01' AND time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT therapist_name, specialty, availability FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Physical Therapy'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY therapist_id HAVING COUNT(appointment_id) > 2
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapist
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM session WHERE therapist_id = 1
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapist ORDER BY therapist_name DESC
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND day = 2
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapist
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty, patient_name FROM therapist JOIN session ON therapist.therapist_id = session.therapist_id JOIN patient ON session.patient_id = patient.patient_id
SELECT therapist_name, start_time, end_time FROM therapist JOIN session ON therapist.therapist_id = session.therapist_id WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT therapist_name, start_time, end_time FROM therapist JOIN session ON therapist.therapist_id = session.therapist_id WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM therapist;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapist WHERE therapist_availability[1] = '08:00';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM session WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_status, appointment_notes FROM appointment WHERE appointment_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM therapist;
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapist WHERE therapist_specialty = 'Counseling';
SELECT * FROM appointment ORDER BY appointment_status;
SELECT DISTINCT therapist_specialty FROM therapist;
